mapper.select: select c.num, c.board_num, c.comment_num, c.writer, c.content, c.reply_count, c.writetime, m.id from comment c left outer join member m on c.writer = m.nick where board_num = #{board_num} and comment_num = #{comment_num} order by writetime desc
mapper.delete: delete from comment where num = #{num}; delete from comment where comment_num = #{num};
mapper.update: update comment set content = #{content} where num = #{num}
update comment set reply_count = (select a.* from (select count(*) from comment where comment_num = #{comment_num}) a) where num = #{comment_num}
mapper.select: select comment_num, count(*) count from comment where writer = #{writer} and comment_num > 0 group by comment_num
select board_num, count(*) count from comment where writer = #{writer} and comment_num = 0 group by board_num
mapper.update: update comment set reply_count = reply_count + #{countValue} where num = #{num}
